name: The 7th Int'l Conference on Statistics, Mathematical Modelling and Analysis
content: The 7th Int'l Conference on Statistics, Mathematical Modelling and Analysis (SMMA 2024) will be held in Kunming, China, during May 28-30, 2024\. The aim of SMMA is to provide a stage for researchers, engineers, academicians as well as industrial professionals from all over the world to present their research results and development activities in Applied statistics, Data modeling and analysis, Design of simulation experiments, Statistical analysis system programming, Statistical applications, Statistical genetics, Statistics and mathematics education, etc. SMMA 2024 will be a valuable and important platform for inspiring international and interdisciplinary exchange at the forefront of Statistics, Mathematical Modelling and Analysis.
